en: Reporter Leslie Ackerson saw people packing up to leave. They were packing photo albums, paintings, and other precious things. One woman spoke to Leslie about having to leave her piano behind. Evacuating for an imminent fire causes you to think about what has true meaning in your life. What you will bring and things you must leave behind. Sometimes the things that you leave are just as meaningful, but too large to bring with you.

Sometimes the things that you leave are just as meaningful, but too large to bring with you.

This video examines Paige Braddock's artwork "Precious Items Left During Evacuation", which was inspired by the experiences of Leslie Ackerson during the Chimney Tops 2 Wildfires. During the wildfires reporter Leslie Ackerson saw many people packing up to leave. They were packing photo albums, paintings, and other precious things. One woman spoke to Ackerson about having to leave her piano behind. Evacuating for an imminent fire causes you to think about what has true meaning in your life. What you will bring and things you must leave behind. Sometimes the things that you leave are just as meaningful, but too large to bring with you.

seo.title: Precious Items Left During Evacuation - Rising From the Ashes Oral Histories

One woman spoke to Leslie about having to leave her piano behind. Evacuating for an imminent fire causes you to think about what has true meaning in your life. What you will bring and things you must leave behind. Sometimes the things that you leave are just as meaningful, but too large to bring with you.
